languages.text: "Арены — это очаги жизни Комморры. {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Друкари{/g} вынуждены питаться психической энергией, рождаемой болью и страхом, иначе они высыхают и деградируют. Потому они ходят на гладиаторские арены как на пиршества, чтобы обожраться там чужими страданиями. А ведьминские культы правят этими кровавыми балами".

traits.locale_text: "Арены — это очаги жизни Комморры. {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Друкари{/g} вынуждены питаться психической энергией, рождаемой болью и страхом, иначе они высыхают и деградируют. Потому они ходят на гладиаторские арены как на пиршества, чтобы обожраться там чужими страданиями. А ведьминские культы правят этими кровавыми балами".
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Arenas are the wellsprings of life in this heinous place. The {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are forced to feed on psychic energy born of pain and fear, or else they wither and degrade. That's why they go to these gladiatorial arenas — they're like feasts where Drukhari stuff themselves with people's suffering. And Wych Cults are the rulers of these bloody carousals."
languages.original_text: "Арены — это очаги жизни Комморры. {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Друкари{/g} вынуждены питаться психической энергией, рождаемой болью и страхом, иначе они высыхают и деградируют. Потому они ходят на гладиаторские арены как на пиршества, чтобы обожраться там чужими страданиями. А ведьминские культы правят этими кровавыми балами".

traits.locale_text: "Arenas are the wellsprings of life in Commorragh. The {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are forced to feed on psychic energy born out of pain and fear, or else they wither and degrade. That's why they go to these gladiatorial arenas — they're like feasts where Drukhari stuff themselves with people's suffering. And Wych Cults are the rulers of these bloody carousals."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “在这恐怖的地方，竞技场就是一切生命的源泉。{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}必须以痛苦与恐惧之中产生的灵能为食，否则他们就会枯萎、消亡。因此，他们会去竞技场观赏角斗。竞技场的角斗就像一场盛宴，黑暗灵族会饱饮受害者的痛苦，而巫灵教派则是这血腥狂欢的统治者。”
languages.original_text: "Arenas are the wellsprings of life in this heinous place. The {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are forced to feed on psychic energy born of pain and fear, or else they wither and degrade. That's why they go to these gladiatorial arenas — they're like feasts where Drukhari stuff themselves with people's suffering. And Wych Cults are the rulers of these bloody carousals."

traits.locale_text: “在这恐怖的地方，竞技场就是一切生命的源泉。{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}必须以痛苦与恐惧之中产生的灵能为食，否则他们就会枯萎、消亡。因此，他们会去竞技场观赏角斗。竞技场的角斗就像一场盛宴，黑暗灵族会饱饮受害者的痛苦，而巫灵教派则是这血腥狂欢的统治者。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「アリーナはこのおぞましい場所に生きる気力を与える場所です。{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}は苦痛から生まれる精神エネルギーを食さなければ弱体化し、力を失ってしまう。だからこういったアリーナに赴くのです――いわばデュカーリが人間の恐怖を食らうための大宴会場のようなものですからね。そして、その血生臭い祭りを支配しているのが魔女団です」
languages.original_text: "Arenas are the wellsprings of life in this heinous place. The {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are forced to feed on psychic energy born of pain and fear, or else they wither and degrade. That's why they go to these gladiatorial arenas — they're like feasts where Drukhari stuff themselves with people's suffering. And Wych Cults are the rulers of these bloody carousals."

traits.locale_text: 「アリーナはこのおぞましい場所に生きる気力を与える場所です。{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}は苦痛から生まれる精神エネルギーを食さなければ弱体化し、力を失ってしまう。だからこういったアリーナに赴くのです――いわばデュカーリが人間の恐怖を食らうための大宴会場のようなものですからね。そして、その血生臭い祭りを支配しているのが魔女団です」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «Los combates del coliseo son los pozos de vida de este abyecto lugar. Los {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} tienen que alimentarse de las emanaciones psíquicas que producen el dolor y el miedo para evitar marchitarse. Por eso visitan estas arenas de gladiadores: son como festines en los que los Drukhari pueden saciarse de sufrimiento ajeno., y los Culto de Brujas son los que dirigen estos festivales sangrientos».
languages.original_text: "Arenas are the wellsprings of life in this heinous place. The {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are forced to feed on psychic energy born of pain and fear, or else they wither and degrade. That's why they go to these gladiatorial arenas — they're like feasts where Drukhari stuff themselves with people's suffering. And Wych Cults are the rulers of these bloody carousals."

traits.locale_text: «Los combates del coliseo son los pozos de vida de este abyecto lugar. Los {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} tienen que alimentarse de las emanaciones psíquicas que producen el dolor y el miedo para evitar marchitarse. Por eso visitan estas arenas de gladiadores: son como festines en los que los Drukhari pueden saciarse de sufrimiento ajeno., y los Culto de Brujas son los que dirigen estos festivales sangrientos».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "Arenas are the wellsprings of life in this heinous place. The Drukhari are forced to feed on psychic energy born of pain and fear, or else they wither and degrade. That's why they go to these gladiatorial arenas — they're like feasts where Drukhari stuff themselves with people's suffering. And Wych Cults are the rulers of these bloody carousals."

languages.text: « Dans cet endroit abject, les arènes sont de véritables sources de vie. Les {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukharis{/g} ont besoin de se nourrir de l'énergie psychique née de la peur. S'ils n'ont pas leur dose, ils finissent par dépérir. C'est pour ça qu'ils assistent à ces combats de gladiateurs. Pour eux, c'est un peu comme un banquet où ils se repaissent de la souffrance des autres. Et ce sont les Cultes Cérastes qui gèrent ces festins sanglants. »
languages.original_text: "Arenas are the wellsprings of life in this heinous place. The {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are forced to feed on psychic energy born of pain and fear, or else they wither and degrade. That's why they go to these gladiatorial arenas — they're like feasts where Drukhari stuff themselves with people's suffering. And Wych Cults are the rulers of these bloody carousals."

traits.locale_text: « Dans cet endroit abject, les arènes sont de véritables sources de vie. Les {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukharis{/g} ont besoin de se nourrir de l'énergie psychique née de la peur. S'ils n'ont pas leur dose, ils finissent par dépérir. C'est pour ça qu'ils assistent à ces combats de gladiateurs. Pour eux, c'est un peu comme un banquet où ils se repaissent de la souffrance des autres. Et ce sont les Cultes Cérastes qui gèrent ces festins sanglants. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Arenen sind die Quellen des Lebens an diesem schändlichen Ort. Die {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} müssen die psychische Energie von Schmerz und Angst in sich aufnehmen, sonst verwelken sie und zersetzen sich. Darum besuchen sie die Gladiatorenarenen – sie sind wie ein Festmahl, das sie mit dem Leid der Leute nährt. Und Hekatarii-Kulte leiten diese blutigen Gelage."
languages.original_text: "Arenas are the wellsprings of life in this heinous place. The {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are forced to feed on psychic energy born of pain and fear, or else they wither and degrade. That's why they go to these gladiatorial arenas — they're like feasts where Drukhari stuff themselves with people's suffering. And Wych Cults are the rulers of these bloody carousals."

traits.locale_text: "Arenen sind die Quellen des Lebens an diesem schändlichen Ort. Die {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} müssen die psychische Energie von Schmerz und Angst in sich aufnehmen, sonst verwelken sie und zersetzen sich. Darum besuchen sie die Gladiatorenarenen – sie sind wie ein Festmahl, das sie mit dem Leid der Leute nährt. Und Hekatarii-Kulte leiten diese blutigen Gelage."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Arenalar, bu çirkin yerin yaşam pınarıdır. {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhariler{/g}, acı ve korkudan doğan ruhsezi enerjisinden beslenmek zorundadır. Beslenmezseler solup çürüdüklerinden bu gladyatör arenalarına gidiyorlar. Drukhariler, arenalarda insanların acılarından doya doya beslenip ziyafet çeker. Viç Tarikatları ise bu kanlı âlemlere hükmeder."
languages.original_text: "Arenas are the wellsprings of life in this heinous place. The {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are forced to feed on psychic energy born of pain and fear, or else they wither and degrade. That's why they go to these gladiatorial arenas — they're like feasts where Drukhari stuff themselves with people's suffering. And Wych Cults are the rulers of these bloody carousals."

traits.locale_text: "Arenalar bu çirkin yerin yaşam membasıdır. {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhariler{/g}, acı ve korkudan doğan ruhsezi enerjisinden beslenmek zorundadır, yoksa solup çürürler, bu yüzden de bu gladyatör arenalarına gidiyorlar. Buralar Drukhariler için, insanların acılarından doya doya beslendikleri birer ziyafet gibidir. Viç Tarikatları ise bu kanlı alemlerin efendileridir."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
